statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_analysis ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM employee_performance_analysis GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE department = 'HR' AND performance_score BETWEEN 7 AND 9 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY salary DESC, performance_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY employee_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE salary < 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE department = 'HR' AND salary > 60000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC LIMIT 7

SELECT employee_name, department, performance_score FROM employee_performance_analysis WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 AND department <> 'IT' ORDER BY performance_score DESC, department ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM Employee
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_name = 'Sales'
SELECT department_id, location FROM Department
SELECT * FROM Department ORDER BY department_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department_name FROM Employee INNER JOIN Department ON Employee.department_id = Department.department_id WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM Employee GROUP BY department_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT department_name, location FROM Department WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY department_id ASC, hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, bonus_amount FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id WHERE bonus_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary_amount + bonus_amount AS total_income FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees LEFT JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, project_name, assignment_date FROM employees INNER JOIN assignments ON employees.employee_id = assignments.employee_id WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT employee_name, department_name, hire_date FROM employees LEFT JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.manager_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(salary_amount) FROM salaries;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT project_name, project_manager_id FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, review_date, rating FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
